name: vega-parser
description: Parse Vega specifications to runtime dataflows.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -g vega-dataflow:vega,vega-expression:vega,vega-util:vega -n vega -o build/vega-parser.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-parser.js -c -m -o build/vega-parser.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-parser.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-parser.js build/vega-parser.min.js
